description: We're looking for an experienced Front-end engineer who is able to lead a team of junior developers. You and your team will be working primarily on the Account Manager and Website repositories to help build the UI's needed for the applications used by our community.
payNotes: Ineligible for task points (you will be creating tasks for your team)
responsibilities: Provide guidance to other developers when assistance is needed
Coach team members on best practices and industry standards
Regular calls with Bucky, Justin, and Kristy to discuss new projects, design improvements, and future roadmap

description: We are looking for an Accounting Manager to be responsible for sending payments to all contributors on a weekly basis, as well as sending daily reward payments for all tasks completed by developers.
responsibilities: Maintain a clear, publicly auditable history of all payments sent
Provide suggestions on how to automate repetitive tasks to improve reliability and consistency
Work with the development team to build new accounting tools and features
High attention to detail and accuracy
technologyRequirements: Experience with the Account Manager desktop application (training provided)
